title.rendered: Roomza announces opening of Roomza New Orleans at Melrose Mansion

content.rendered:
NEW ORLEANS, May 13, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Roomza, the innovative hotel startup redefining the hospitality industry with its focus on personalization and flexibility, is thrilled to announce the opening of Roomza New Orleans at Melrose Mansion on June 1st, 2024. This personalized luxury boutique hotel, located in the historic Marigny area, is set to offer an unparalleled guest experience in one of New Orleans’ most iconic neighborhoods.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/roomza-announces-opening-of-roomza-new-orleans-at-melrose-mansion-302144101.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com

This personalized luxury boutique hotel, located in the historic Marigny area, is set to offer […]
